get_user_by_id: SELECT id, username, email, password FROM usuarios WHERE id=%s;
get_user_by_email: SELECT id, username, email, password FROM usuarios WHERE email=%s;
get_user_by_username: SELECT id, username, email, password FROM usuarios WHERE username=%s;
create_user: INSERT INTO usuarios (username, password, email) VALUES (%s, %s, %s);
get_confessions: SELECT * FROM confesiones ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT %s;
create_confession: INSERT INTO confesiones (conf_text, conf_img, user_id) VALUES (%s, %s, %s);
